properties.name: external-order.webhook.base-url
properties.description: Base URL of the external system that receives rejected-order webhook callbacks, for example https://partner.example.com.

properties.name: external-order.webhook.rejected-path
properties.description: Path template appended to base-url for rejected-order callbacks. Supports {source} placeholder, for example /webhooks/external-orders/{source}/rejected.

properties.name: external-order.webhook.cancel-path
properties.description: Path template appended to base-url for cancellation-result callbacks. Supports {source} placeholder, for example /webhooks/external-orders/{source}/cancel-result.
